kpi.name: M1010C175

kpi_info.title: RRC CONNECTION DROPS DURING ISHO CAUSED BY RESERVATION RATE SC FOR RT
kpi_info.use: The number of RRC connection drops during Load Based inter-system handover due to ReservationRateSC > LHOresRateSC - by UEs with RT connection. UPDATED:When the source RNC receives a RANAP: IU RELEASE COMMAND message with a failure cause from the CN - when inter-system handover procedure is ongoing. This counter is updated only when the trigger is Load Based HO reason ReservationRateSC > LHOresRateSC.

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC CONNECTION DROPS DURING ISHO CAUSED BY RESERVATION RATE SC FOR RT
